Tap the "酷狗音乐" icon to launch the application.
Click the "K" icon at the bottom left of the screen to navigate to the homepage.
Scroll down to explore more recommended content and available categories.
Click the search button to open the search interface.
Input "辐射3" into the search bar.
Click the heart icon next to "Butcher Pete(Pt. 1)" to add the song to favorites.
Click the "歌单" tab to switch to the playlist view.
